summary: I need to figure out why my mods grass load out keeps messing up after downloading it from nexus. I will post a new mod page once I fixed it all.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma]
[color=#ff0000][size=6]Please Do NOT use my Mod. Issues keep happening to grass load out. I will post up a new mod page once I have solved it. Thanks.
[/size][/color]















[size=4]None of the meshes or textures are made by me. I used TES5Edit to make the changes to the grasses. I do NOT know how to use CK and CK doesn't seem to start up for me anyway.[/size]
[size=4]Don't ask for grasses on roads to be taken out or for compatibility with other mods. Chances are I don't use them or you can have my mod here overwrite.[/size]
[size=4]I know grasses will be in a few odd places. IF I take them out then you will lose more grass density in forested areas where I want the grass. Just deal with it or make some CK edits to the land itself. I don't mind you uploading your own fix for roads or homes for this mod. Go ahead, do what you do.

[/size]
[color=#00ff00][size=5]I would like to thank these following mod authors:[/size][/color]
[size=4]-[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/139369/?]32cm[/url]﻿
[size=4]-[/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5649286]Preeum[/url]﻿
[size=4]-[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5678513/?]AceeQ[/url]﻿
[size=4]-[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/934000]Elinlen[/url]﻿
[size=4]-[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/41808]Vurt[/url]﻿[/font][/center][center][font=Tahoma][size=4]-[/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5357888]Tamu75[/url]﻿[/size]
[size=4]-[/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4746442]Josh Ezzel[/url]﻿[/size]

[size=4]Give these authors some kudos for their work. All I did was put together an Esp and edit what they have already done.[/size]



Expect a slightly higher performance hit than my previous mod Viscous Grasses. I have my grass density set to 60 and (that's the lowest I recommend anyone) I lose maybe 4-7 frames at most. to where for viscous I lost maybe 2-5 frames with the same grass density value.



[color=#93c47d][size=6]Voluptuous Grasses[/size]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/90925/90925-1524601595-1241215724.jpeg[/img]﻿﻿[/color]
[/font][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/90925/90925-1524599198-365289613.png[/img]﻿﻿
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/90925/90925-1524601396-2078090049.png[/img]﻿




[color=#93c47d][size=6]Installation[/size][/color]

[list]
[*]Download this mod with your mod manager and allow it to do it's thing.
[*][color=#6fa8dc]If you are manually downloading then go ahead and drop the contents into your skyrim data folder. Be sure that you do not have any grass mods or grass related textures and meshes in your game.[/color]
[/list]

[size=5]Load Order
[/size]
-Random Mod.esp
          -Other Random Mod.esp
        ﻿-[color=#00ffff]Tamriel Realoaded.esp[/color]
           -[color=#00ffff]Voluptuous Grasses.esp




[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/90925/90925-1524601671-1828650877.jpeg[/img]﻿[/color]


[size=5]
INI Settings
(well this is how mine are set)

[Grass]
b30GrassVS=0
bAllowCreateGrass=1
bAllowLoadGrass=0
bDrawShaderGrass=1
bGrassPointLighting=1
fGrassFadeRange=16500
fGrassWindMagnitudeMax=125
fGrassWindMagnitudeMin=5
iGrassCellRadius=2

(Important values)
iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=15

iMinGrassSize=70[/size]
You can go as low as 50 if you want. But it shouldn't be necessary for most users. I stay at 60 myself. Then again I don't really play the game anymore.
[color=#6fa8dc]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83532/83532-1524553570-613197707.jpeg[/img]﻿[/color]

For anyone interested in my ENB just click [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83532]THIS[/url]﻿ and go check it out. Its the most recent update I did for SnowFall weathers.
﻿
[color=#ff0000][size=6]Do NOT mix this grass mod with any other. It wont break your game but it will cause tons of grass issues. I switched some grass texture's names around.

[/size][/color]I will update this mod page description when I have the chance.﻿[/center]
author: TheForkOnTheLeft
